item.title: Build a R Package with Rcpp in 30 minutes
item.description:
Rcpp is package with which you could write c++ code within R. You could simply write a inline C++ code in R like this:
Or you could save your .cpp file and call the function from R. With this powerful tool, you gain the productivity of R and the speed of C++ Let’s try to build a small package with Rcpp . Take the Poisson LASSO regression as an example.
